guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"6idgd","text":"Please read the general guidelines for working in the Ancient DNA protocol collection – University of Tartu, Institute of Genomics.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0cuf","text":"Drill","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ucav","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2q1e1","text":"Other status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5jer4","text":"Place down sheets of aluminum foil to cover the entire surface of the drill hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15jkc","text":"Make an L-shaped “wall” of folded foil that runs along the back of your work area and the side without the drill to keep flying dust from expanding across the hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4c15t","text":"Place down a smaller piece of foil for your working surface. Fold small pieces of foil that you can wrap around the beaks of the tooth extractor. Place a big weighing boat onto the working surface. Change this setup for each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dk8u1","text":"Gather clean, decontaminated tools for drilling and place them on the foil. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6a32a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2l64e","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f9po0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"eal8f","text":"Make sure your drill bit/wheel is centered and firmly in the drill before drilling and that your foot is off the pedal when not intending to drill.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54n5e","text":"Turn on the drill in “FWD” mode and choose a medium speed to prevent overheating/burning of the bone or dentine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"55lmn","text":"Put on clean sleeves by pushing your thumbs through the plastic close to the cuffs to keep the sleeve in place, then gloves on top. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bmag","text":"Wrap foil strips around the ends of your tooth extractor (for holding the tooth).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1tt0v","text":"Hold the tooth with the tooth extractor and drill carefully a few millimeters above the end of the root.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6rnug","text":"When drilling is completed, put your samples in labeled bags. Wipe these down with a small amount of DNA Exitus before adding to your sample box.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1mc5a","text":"Rinse off the drill wheel with MilliQ water first then into your 6% bleach for a few minutes or while you are drilling the next tooth. Then rinse with water and finally ethanol before drying for use again.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"98ish","text":"Carefully remove and throw away the weighing boat, small work surface foil, dirty gloves and sleeves; put on new gloves.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"edcmf","text":"For the next sample, start from step 9.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5l9ne","text":"When finished for the day, wipe down the tooth extractors and drill spanner with DNA Exitus and put away. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bm6u","text":"Leave drill bits and scrapers to soak in bleach while you throw away all foil and other consumables and wipe down all inner hood work surfaces and the outside of the drill with DNA Exitus and wipe dry with paper towels.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cf9se","text":"Use a clean toothbrush with a little DNA Exitus to remove sample powder from the top/inside of the drill head.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"esind","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9vfl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ogjk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7r30s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9mpl1","text":"Do not use bleach! This will rust the inner components.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"39ogg","text":"Make sure your metal tools are rinsed and dry and no bleach remains! ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a57g6","text":"Then put them away.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dr4ql","text":"Turn on regular faucet water and carefully pour off thebleach, water, and ethanol from the tool decontamination station. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"904rd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b4jom","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"eurrs","text":"ALWAYS wear eye goggles when pouring bleach and other chemicals.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9bdfb","text":"Clean table surface with DNA Exitus and dry with paper towels.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"evpe8","text":"Put down the glass and turn off the hood. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fb6k4","text":"Turn off the drill.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"csiqo","text":"Take any trash and personal reagents with you.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dmp5o","text":"Turn the hood on full power and open the glass. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6icj6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ermb8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"clou0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3h64f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3c2s2","text":"Label your bags and tubes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"s0gb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7vju","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9b4i0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26ekh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"apmlu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"edg69","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7c6l","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1pn5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5m53j","text":"Tubes should be closed immediately after taking them from the package and opened only during sampling. This will limit contamination.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["231.00000762939453","120.00000762939453"],"data":[["Bags for drilled samples",""],["Sample ID","ABC001A"],["Date","DD/MM/YYYY"],["Initials","YZ"]],"guid":"C1EF0020902C11EDB6709529C1E808A8","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Bags for drilled samples",""],["Sample ID","ABC001A"],["Date","DD/MM/YYYY"],["Initials","YZ"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}},"2":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["231.00000762939453","124.00000762939453","189.00000762939453"],"data":[["Tubes e.g. for collecting calculus","Top","Side"],["Content","","e.g. calculus/drill powder"],["Project ID","PROJ","PROJ"],["Sample ID","ABC001A","ABC001A"],["Date","DD/MM/YYYY","DD/MM/YYYY"],["Initials","YZ","YZ"]],"guid":"A6C2BCBC7E0A11ECB36D0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Tubes e.g. for collecting calculus","Top","Side"],["Content","","e.g. calculus/drill powder"],["Project ID","PROJ","PROJ"],["Sample ID","ABC001A","ABC001A"],["Date","DD/MM/YYYY","DD/MM/YYYY"],["Initials","YZ","YZ"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"122c2","text":"Wipe down markers and pens with DNA Exitus.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"93pv1","text":"To decontaminate drill bits, drill spanner, tweezers, dental scalers and toothbrush – Soak in 6% bleach for 5 minutes, rinse with MilliQ water, rinse with 70% Ethanol. Clean the drill spanner and tooth extractors with DNA Exitus.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1emv1","text":"Set up decontamination station: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"foih2","text":"4 disposable 100 ml beakers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8nk2g","text":"6% NaOCl (bleach) aliquot [2x] ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c74uh","text":"MilliQ water [1x]  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79beg","text":"70% ethanol aliquot [1x]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rvmq","text":"Clean drill hood and table bench surfaces with DNA Exitus and wipe clean with a paper towel. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"62u4g","text":"Turn the hood on full power and open the glass.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3mcer","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5hm2q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"715ei","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c079o","text":"Aim to do all work as far into the hood as possible to avoid dust escaping and keep eyes behind the glass for protection.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5cg8u","text":"If the tooth has calculus, use the dental scaler to remove it before sampling. Put the tooth into the mini grip bag and hold the tooth outside the bag with your fingers. Now push gently with scaler and collect all calculus inside the bag. Remove the tooth and pour the calculus on weighing paper. Use weighing paper to place calculus in a labeled 1.5 ml tube after taring.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bv7sk","text":"Place the bag with your sample and the clean sample bag and tube into the hood behind the foil wall.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2saf9","text":"If the tooth has calculus, use the dental scaler to remove it before sampling. Put the tooth into the mini grip bag and hold the tooth outside the bag with your fingers. Now push gently with scaler and collect all calculus inside the bag. Remove the tooth and pour the calculus on weighing paper. Use weighing paper to place calculus in a labeled 1.5 ml tube after taring.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"983ob","text":"Wrap foil strips around the ends of your tooth extractor (for holding the tooth).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7vuns","text":"Hold the tooth with the tooth extractor and drill carefully a few millimeters above the end of the root.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6p5a4","text":"When drilling is completed, put your samples in labeled bags. Wipe these down with a small amount of DNA Exitus before adding to your sample box.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"14gil","text":"Rinse off the drill wheel with MilliQ water first then into your 6% bleach for a few minutes or while you are drilling the next tooth. Then rinse with water and finally ethanol before drying for use again.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a65qo","text":"Carefully remove and throw away the weighing boat, small work surface foil, dirty gloves, and sleeves. Put on new gloves.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1dct7","text":"When finished for the day, wipe down the tooth extractors and drill spanner with DNA Exitus and put away.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"10cud","text":"For the next sample, start from step 9.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9v67l","text":"Use a clean toothbrush with a little DNA Exitus to remove sample powder from the top/inside of the drill head.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72r05","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63inv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8pvip","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3lis8","text":"Do not use bleach! This will rust the inner components.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49itl","text":"Leave drill bits and scalers to soak in bleach while you throw away all foil and other consumables and wipe down all inner hood work surfaces and the outside of the drill with DNA Exitus and wipe dry with paper towels.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"62kun","text":"Reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"au7gc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"76nvb","text":"NaOCl (bleach) solution (6%)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78fah","text":"- H290 May be corrosive to metals.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87cbl","text":"- H314 Causes severe skin burns and eye damage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bvaa","text":"- H411 Toxic to aquatic life with long lasting effects.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ic5m","text":"- EUH206 Warning! Do not use together with other products. May release dangerous gases (chlorine). Remove from surface after recommended incubation time with water-soaked tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cv6h","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"801bn","text":"DNA ExitusPlus","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6ndi","text":"H319 Causes serious eye irritation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9egih","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"618v4","text":"Ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6nd7","text":"- H225 Highly flammable liquid and vapor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f55nu","text":"- H319 Causes serious eye irritation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jqfc","text":"      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":1,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cj60c","text":"Equipment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bg8m8","text":"UV radiation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bpqqn","text":"- UV radiation can damage eyes and can be carcinogenic in contact with skin. Do not look directly at unshielded UV radiation. Do not expose unprotected skin to UV radiation.
